A2 a slightly sour, thick liquid made from milk with bacteria added to it, sometimes eaten plain and sometimes with sugar, fruit, etc. added: natural/plain yogurt strawberry yogurt low-fat yogurt I only had a yogurt (= a container of this) for lunch. I settled for orange juice, yoghurt, and black coffee for breakfast. They eat no animal products at all – no milk, cheese, eggs, yoghourt, etc.
